entry.title: 3M CITRUS-24OZ-IND - Citrus Aerosol Base Cleaner 24 Oz 7000028595

Vendor: 3M
Type: Cleaners
Price: 29.43

[shortdesc]

3M Citrus Base Cleaner, transparent, 24 oz (709.77 ml)

  • 3Mâ„¢ Citrus Base Cleaner is a non-corrosive aerosol cleaner used to help dissolve and remove dirt, grease, tar, and many non-curing adhesives
  • It cleans without streaking and has a fresh citrus scent.
    • [/shortdesc][additional] DOWNLOAD SPEC SHEET [/additional]

    Product Information

    Brand 3M
    Color Transparent
    Industry General Industrial, MRO
    Origin Country United States
    Product Type Cleaners
    Volume 24 oz

    Extra Product Information

  • It removes grease, oil, ink, and most adhesives
  • It cleans without streaking and has a fresh citrus scent.

    • Product Information

  • Cleans gently and leaves a pleasant citrus scent
  • Contains no chlorinated or petroleum based solvents
  • Gently cleans oil, grease, tar and grime
  • Can help prepare surfaces for adhesive bonding

    • Suggested Application

  • Used to help dissolve and remove dirt, grease, tar and many non-curing type adhesives
  • Can be used to degrease substrates for adhesive bonding in place of many chlorinated or petroleum based solvents
  • however, will not substitute for etching or similar sub
